recommendations.title: Right-Sizing EC2 Instances
recommendations.description: Analyze EC2 instance utilization and right-size instances to reduce costs.  Identify underutilized instances and scale up to more powerful configurations.
steps: Use AWS Compute Optimizer to identify underutilized instances.
Increase instance size (e.g., from t3 to m5) for critical workloads.
Implement auto-scaling to dynamically adjust instance counts based on demand.

recommendations.title: Optimize Database Costs (PostgreSQL)
recommendations.description: Review PostgreSQL database configuration and indexing.  Optimize queries and consider using read replicas to reduce database load.
steps: Consider using read replicas for read-heavy workloads.

recommendations.title: Leverage Free Tier for CDN (CloudFront)
recommendations.description: Utilize CloudFront for content delivery to reduce load on the origin server and improve performance.
steps: Configure caching rules for static assets.

recommendations.title: Evaluate Azure Virtual Network
recommendations.description: Implement Azure Virtual Network to isolate and control network traffic, reducing potential security risks and improving performance.

recommendations.title: Consider GKE for Container Orchestration
recommendations.description: Evaluate GKE for container orchestration to optimize resource utilization and reduce costs.  Consider spot instances for cost savings.
steps: Utilize spot instances for non-critical workloads.
